```{r}
globalobjectremover <- function(incfuncs = F) {
  if (incfuncs == F) {
    rm(list = setdiff(ls(), lsf.str()))
  } else if (incfuncs == T) {
    rm(list = ls())
  } else {
    print("Error>> incfuncs has wrong variable type. Use a boolean value.")
  }
}
```
